title: Pixel2 64GB can't allow "OEM unlock" in dev option is unavailable even connecting internet at first
content:
Pixel2 64GB cant bootloader unlock , because "OEM unlock" in dev option is unavailable. Google provided solution for that issue,  "Factory reset, and connect to internet at first settings" doesnt make fix that bug.
I want to Send back repair to Google, but I'm not sure whether it can or cannot.
